title: Add a 'Home' navigation menu option

requirements.text: Add a navigation menu option labeled "Home" to the Pegasus Gifting site interface. The Home action must return the user to the start of the guided chat experience (welcome step) and bring the view back to the top of the main content without requiring a page reload or adding new routes.
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly visible navigation/menu area includes a "Home" option labeled exactly "Home".
Clicking "Home" resets the guided flow back to the initial welcome state (equivalent to Start Over/restart).
Clicking "Home" scrolls the page to the top of the app (or hero/header area) so the user is oriented back at the start.
The Home option is keyboard accessible and has an appropriate accessible label/semantics (e.g., button or link).
No new pages or routing are introduced; the app remains a single-page guided experience.

constraints: Frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be edited.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing multi-page routing or deep links.
